select osp_scaffolding.worksiteId, osp_scaffolding.title, osp_scaffolding.readyColor, osp_scaffolding.pendingColor, osp_scaffolding.lockedColor, osp_scaffolding.completedColor, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, eid USERID, osp_matrix.owner matrix_userId, status, osp_scaffolding_criteria.seq_num criterion_sequence, crit_label.description criterion_description, osp_scaffolding_levels.seq_num level_sequence, level_label.description level_description, osp_scaffolding_cell.rootcriterion_id, osp_wizard_page.id wizard_page_id, osp_wiz_page_attachment.artifactId, content_resource.RESOURCE_ID, content_resource.RESOURCE_UUID resource_displayname
FROM osp_scaffolding JOIN sakai_site_user ON osp_scaffolding.worksiteId = sakai_site_user.site_id JOIN sakai_user_id_map ON sakai_site_user.user_id=sakai_user_id_map.USER_ID JOIN sakai_user ON sakai_user_id_map.USER_ID=sakai_user.USER_ID LEFT JOIN osp_matrix ON sakai_site_user.user_id = osp_matrix.owner AND osp_matrix.scaffolding_id = osp_scaffolding.id LEFT JOIN osp_matrix_cell ON osp_matrix.id = osp_matrix_cell.matrix_id LEFT JOIN osp_wizard_page ON osp_matrix_cell.wizard_page_id = osp_wizard_page.id LEFT JOIN osp_scaffolding_cell ON osp_matrix_cell.scaffolding_cell_id = osp_scaffolding_cell.id LEFT JOIN osp_wiz_page_attachment ON osp_wiz_page_attachment.page_id=osp_matrix_cell.wizard_page_id LEFT JOIN content_resource ON RESOURCE_UUID=osp_wiz_page_attachment.artifactId
LEFT JOIN osp_scaffolding_criteria ON osp_scaffolding_cell.rootcriterion_id = osp_scaffolding_criteria.elt LEFT JOIN osp_matrix_label crit_label ON osp_scaffolding_criteria.elt=crit_label.id LEFT JOIN osp_scaffolding_levels ON osp_scaffolding_cell.level_id = osp_scaffolding_levels.elt LEFT JOIN osp_matrix_label level_label ON osp_scaffolding_levels.elt=level_label.id where osp_scaffolding.id=?
ORDER BY userId, level_sequence, criterion_sequence
